title: Why PNG to JPG is essential for SEO
content:
When building a website, performance is key. PNG files are great for transparency, but they are often much larger than JPGs. By converting to JPG, you reduce page weight, leading to faster indexing by Google and a better user experience.

Our free tool handles this conversion with zero quality loss visible to the human eye.

title: Top 5 Tools for Image Optimization
content:
1. Image Resizer: Perfect for fitting banners.
2. PNG to JPG: For size reduction.
3. Word Counter: For SEO copy checking.
4. QR Generator: For marketing collateral.
5. Password Generator: Keep your site secure.
